text: My manager is the VERY BEST I have ever worked for, SERIOUSLY!! She is great because I know if I ever need her for "anything" she will be there & never make me feel "stupid" or afraid to ask her or confide in her. If I have an issue with work or a question, she will get me the answer one way or another. She is extremely knowledgeable about her field. She is always willing to help if you need her. I started as a Temporary employee & during that time she waould let me learn as much as i could just to be better prepared to apply for a full time position. She definitely encouraged me to keep going. i also am thankful for her because earlier this year I almost lost my husband due to illness & my boss was so supportive & compassionate and totally understood what I was going through. She was sincerely concerned & I knew she was there for me if I needed her. i only hope that i can continue to work for her & with her until I retire & that is many many years from now. She is the BEST!!!!
